title: Futuristic Guns Sound FX Pack 2
description: The second volume in a series of high definition and modern sound effects inspired by the latest sci-fi films and action games.
longDescription:
The second volume in a series of high definition and modern sound effects inspired by the latest sci-fi films and action games. Futuristic Guns Sound FX Pack 2 combines high tech weaponry sounds with punchy impact sounds to create a whole new gamer experience. A must-have for the serious sound designer!


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/futuristic-guns-sound-fx-pack-2-preview


Free pack samples here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1Iph-wHqb46eo77vtNYZNKIOK1vuaduXg?usp=sharing
technicalDetails:
Features:

·        Blasters

·        Rifles

·        Canons

·        Shotguns

·        Lasers

·        Ion Canon

·        Propulsion Guns

·        And much more


Total Tracks: 197

Total Cues: 197

Total Minutes of Audio: 3.5 minutes

Format: 44.1 kHz & 16 bit

Does Music Loop? no

Number of Sound FX: 197


Technical Details


·        Over 45 total guns falling into 21 different categories including rifles, shotguns, machine guns, blasters, canons, and more.

·        Over 25 designed reload sound effects


Preview: https://soundcloud.com/david-dumais-687079117/futuristic-guns-sound-fx-pack-2-preview
